sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO md_connections ( id , project_id_fk , type , host , port , username , password , dburl , name , native_sql , num_catalogs , num_columns , num_constraints , num_groups , num_roles , num_indexes , num_other_objects , num_packages , num_privileges , num_schemas , num_sequences , num_stored_programs , num_synonyms , num_tables , num_tablespaces , num_triggers , num_user_defined_data_types , num_users , num_views , comments , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by ) VALUES ( #id# , #projectIdFk# , #type# , #host# , #port# , #username# , #password# , #dburl# , #name# , #nativeSql# , #numCatalogs# , #numColumns# , #numConstraints# , #numGroups# , #numRoles# , #numIndexes# , #numOtherObjects# , #numPackages# , #numPrivileges# , #numSchemas# , #numSequences# , #numStoredPrograms# , #numSynonyms# , #numTables# , #numTablespaces# , #numTriggers# , #numUserDefinedDataTypes# , #numUsers# , #numViews# , #comments# , #securityGroupId# , #createdOn# , #createdBy# , #lastUpdatedOn# , #lastUpdatedBy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE md_connections SET id = #id# , project_id_fk = #projectIdFk# , type = #type# , host = #host# , port = #port# , username = #username# , password = #password# , dburl = #dburl# , name = #name# , native_sql = #nativeSql# , num_catalogs = #numCatalogs# , num_columns = #numColumns# , num_constraints = #numConstraints# , num_groups = #numGroups# , num_roles = #numRoles# , num_indexes = #numIndexes# , num_other_objects = #numOtherObjects# , num_packages = #numPackages# , num_privileges = #numPrivileges# , num_schemas = #numSchemas# , num_sequences = #numSequences# , num_stored_programs = #numStoredPrograms# , num_synonyms = #numSynonyms# , num_tables = #numTables# , num_tablespaces = #numTablespaces# , num_triggers = #numTriggers# , num_user_defined_data_types = #numUserDefinedDataTypes# , num_users = #numUsers# , num_views = #numViews# , comments = #comments# , security_group_id = #securityGroupId# , created_on = #createdOn# , created_by = #createdBy# , last_updated_on = #lastUpdatedOn# , last_updated_by = #lastUpdatedBy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM md_connections WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , project_id_fk , type , host , port , username , password , dburl , name , native_sql , num_catalogs , num_columns , num_constraints , num_groups , num_roles , num_indexes , num_other_objects , num_packages , num_privileges , num_schemas , num_sequences , num_stored_programs , num_synonyms , num_tables , num_tablespaces , num_triggers , num_user_defined_data_types , num_users , num_views , comments , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by FROM MD_CONNECTIONS WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.PROJECT_ID_FK , A.TYPE , A.HOST , A.PORT , A.USERNAME , A.PASSWORD , A.DBURL , A.NAME , A.NATIVE_SQL , A.NUM_CATALOGS , A.NUM_COLUMNS , A.NUM_CONSTRAINTS , A.NUM_GROUPS , A.NUM_ROLES , A.NUM_INDEXES , A.NUM_OTHER_OBJECTS , A.NUM_PACKAGES , A.NUM_PRIVILEGES , A.NUM_SCHEMAS , A.NUM_SEQUENCES , A.NUM_STORED_PROGRAMS , A.NUM_SYNONYMS , A.NUM_TABLES , A.NUM_TABLESPACES , A.NUM_TRIGGERS , A.NUM_USER_DEFINED_DATA_TYPES , A.NUM_USERS , A.NUM_VIEWS , A.COMMENTS , A.SECURITY_GROUP_ID , A.CREATED_ON , A.CREATED_BY , A.LAST_UPDATED_ON , A.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM ( SELECT ID , PROJECT_ID_FK , TYPE , HOST , PORT , USERNAME , PASSWORD , DBURL , NAME , NATIVE_SQL , NUM_CATALOGS , NUM_COLUMNS , NUM_CONSTRAINTS , NUM_GROUPS , NUM_ROLES , NUM_INDEXES , NUM_OTHER_OBJECTS , NUM_PACKAGES , NUM_PRIVILEGES , NUM_SCHEMAS , NUM_SEQUENCES , NUM_STORED_PROGRAMS , NUM_SYNONYMS , NUM_TABLES , NUM_TABLESPACES , NUM_TRIGGERS , NUM_USER_DEFINED_DATA_TYPES , NUM_USERS , NUM_VIEWS , COMMENTS , SECURITY_GROUP_ID , CREATED_ON , CREATED_BY , LAST_UPDATED_ON , LAST_UPDATED_BY , ROWNUM FROM MD_CONNECTIONS WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
PROJECT_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MD_CONNECTIONS WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
PROJECT_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
